title: Light chilli con carne
ingredients: ['125g lean minced beef', '1/4 onion, finely chopped', '1/2 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 clove garlic, finely chopped', '1 fresh chilli, finely chopped (to taste)', '1/2 teaspoon chilli powder', '1/4 teaspoon dried oregano', '1/2 teaspoon mixed herbs', '1/2 teaspoon ground cumin', '1/2 teaspoon dried basil', '1/2 teaspoon paprika', '1/4 teaspoon ground coriander', 'salt and pepper', '1 stick celery, chopped', '100g mushrooms, chopped', '1 tablespoon red kidney beans or baked beans', '200g chopped tomatoes', '50g uncooked rice']
